scripts.title: 404 URL Suggester
scripts.preview: Enhances 404 error pages by suggesting similar URLs based on Levenshtein distance algorithm, helping users find the content they were looking for
scripts.author: Kris Yotam

scripts.title: Agenda Scheduler V1
scripts.preview: Generates daily writing agendas from feed.json using weighted scores and outputs PDF schedules with current date
scripts.author: Kris Yotam

scripts.title: Archive.org Site Downloader
scripts.preview: Downloads and preserves websites from Wayback Machine snapshots, creating local archives of web content
scripts.author: Kris Yotam

scripts.title: Legal Documents Compiler
scripts.preview: Compiles .tex files in legal documents directory into PDFs, managing both internal and public copies for Next.js frontend access
scripts.author: Kris Yotam

scripts.title: Billboard Data Converter
scripts.preview: Parses HTML content from Billboard charts and converts song data into structured JSON format using BeautifulSoup
scripts.author: Kris Yotam

scripts.title: Hash and Timestamp Utility
scripts.preview: Generates SHA256 hashes for files and creates cryptographic timestamps using Proof of Existence API for data integrity verification
scripts.author: Kris Yotam

scripts.title: URL Archiver V1
scripts.preview: Scans MDX and JSON files for URLs and archives them via multiple archival services with concurrent processing and detailed reporting
scripts.author: Kris Yotam
